Particle.description: Change how the particles in the background work

enabled.description: Enables or disables the particles on the background.

seasonal.description: To have the particles be based on the current season.

Datetime.description: Change how the background works in accordance to a day/night cycle

enabled.description: Allows the background to automatically changing based on current time of day.

realistic.description: Make the background sync to an approx of the current real life day/night cycle.

location.description: Enable to use browser based location (You'll have to give us location permission), Disable to use timezone based location (might be slightly less accurate, but no permission granting required)

default_state.description: The default time to set when time is not flowing (-2 = light background, -1 = dark background)

Debug.description: Settings to do with debugging, could cause website to load slower or things to break.

verbose_loader.description: Enables all debugging for the `loader` class

verbose_Projects.description: Enables all debugging for the `Projects` class

verbose_Settings.description: Enables all debugging for the `Settings` class

verbose_DateTime.description: Enables all debugging for the `Datetime` class

verbose_Stories.description: Enables all debugging for the `Stories` class
